name: Space Defenders (itch) (Mongoosenberry)
description:
Gameplay:
In this game, you pilot a spaceship. You have an AI buddy that helps shoot the Aliens. Defeat the bosses that appear when you get 5,000 and 10,000 points to win. Aliens sometimes drop white orbs which heal you if collected. 

Controls:
Use W and S to move up and down. Hold left click to shoot. If you have more than 4 health, you can shoot a big shot by clicking the middle mouse button. If you have more than 9 health then you can right click to revive your buddy if he dies.

All music, sounds, and art were made by the creator of the game.

This game was made with the Godot engine.

Hope you enjoy it! Have fun!
